extends ConnectionBorrowerStatsDataSource
implements ICpStatsDataSource

        Specified by:

      • getAllowedWaitMsec

        public final long getAllowedWaitMsec()
        Specified by:
        getAllowedWaitMsec in interface IConnectionPoolStats
        Returns:
        the maximum number of milliseconds a request for a connection is allowed to wait (e.g. before the request is failed), or a negative value (e.g., IBorrowStats.NEGATIVE_LONG_VALUE) indicating inability to retrieve that

        Specified by:
